content:
Please do not use the DOWNLOAD button, since it is unavailable for this version.
1. If it is installed from Google Play, please use Google Play to update it.
2. If it is installed in other ways, please find the update in our home page. (The address of the homepage is in the ABOUT menu)
content_en:
Please do not use the DOWNLOAD button, since it is unavailable for this version.
1. If it is installed from Google Play, please use Google Play to update it.
2. If it is installed in other ways, please find the update in our home page. (The address of the homepage is in the ABOUT menu)
content_zh:
请不要使用“下载”按钮，它在当前版本不可用。
1. 如果是通过Google Play进行安装的，请到Google Play进行更新。
2. 如果是通过其它方式安装的，请到软件主页查找更新。（主页地址在“关于”菜单中）
